document_data.name: Scoril
document_data.mainbody: The '''Scoril''' family was a noble house of [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Bases of Operations: The Scoril family had holdings in the city of [[Marsember]], and were the only noble family to be prominent there.
document_data.Activities: The members of the house were loyal to the Crown and often served as factors, wardens, and officers in the [[Blue Dragons]].
document_data.History: They were originally nobles of the independent city of Marsember, before Cormyr gained the city, and encouraged House [[Marliir]] to join in the fight. In the {{YearlinkName|1227}}, the Scorils switched sides to help the Cormyrean cause.
document_data.Members: * [[Bledryn Scoril]], head of the family and the king's herald for Marsember in the late 1300s DR.
